step.framework.extensions
Interface ServiceInterceptor

All Superinterfaces:
Interceptor
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceInterceptorBase
public interface ServiceInterceptor
extends Interceptor

This interface specifies the methods an extension's service interceptor must implement to intercep service execution.

Method Summary
 void interceptAfter(ServiceInterceptorParameter param)
          Executed just after service execution.
 void interceptBefore(ServiceInterceptorParameter param)
          Executed just before service execution.
 

Method Detail

interceptBefore

void interceptBefore(ServiceInterceptorParameter param)
                     throws DomainException,
                            ServiceInterceptorException
Executed just before service execution.

Parameters:
param - object that provides access to configuration and context data
Throws:
DomainException - to abort service processing due to a domain condition
ServiceInterceptorException - to abort service processing due to another condition
